appel:RULE.description: Service has privacy seal and does not share data with unrelated third parties.
Service collects data needed for e-commerce activities but may share this data with legal entities following different practices, public fora, or unrelated third parties.

appel:RULESET.appel:RULE: promptmsg="Warning! Service collects data needed for e-commerce activities but may share this data with legal entities following different practices, public fora, or unrelated third parties. Do you want to continue (using limited access)?">

appel:RULE.description: Service collects data needed for e-commerce activities but may use it also for marketing, tailoring, or 'other' purposes.

appel:RULESET.appel:RULE: promptmsg="Warning! Service collects data needed for e-commerce activities but may use it also for marketing, tailoring, or 'other' purposes. Do you still want to continue (using limited access)?">

appel:RULE.description: Site collects healthcare information but participates in a seal program.

appel:RULESET.appel:RULE: promptmsg="FYI: This site collects healthcare information but participates in a seal program. Continue?">

appel:RULE.description: Site collects healthcare information but does not participate in a seal program.

appel:RULESET.appel:RULE: promptmsg="Warning! Site collects healthcare information but does not participate in a seal program. Do you want to continue anyway"> (using limited access)?">

appel:RULE.description: Service collects data needed for e-commerce activities only, without sharing with legal entities following different practices, public fora or unrelated third parties. A seal program vouches for this.
Service does not provide access to identifiable data it collects

appel:RULESET.appel:RULE: promptmsg="Warning! Service does not provide access to identifiable data it collects. Do you want to continue anyway (using limited access)?">

appel:RULE.description: Privacy policy matches Look For The Seal preferences
